Text: About a Dog was Debbie Barham's last comedy proposal before she died in 2003.
Triplets:<About a Dog
1:
--------------------
Text: About a Dog:  The programme stars Alan Davies, playing a dog, Jack, with his owner, Sarah, played by Kate Ashfield in the first series and Claire Goose in the second, in a sitcom told through the eyes of a canine.
Triplets:<Alan Davies
